info.title: SysDVR Overlay
info.author: Hartie95
info.description: Overlay to check and change the current mode of SysDVR.
info.details:
This is a simple Tesla overlay to check and change the current mode of SysDVR.

Setup

Setup the tesla menu and nx-ovlloader
Setup SysDVR

changelog:
v1.0.13
This update just adds compatibility with the newest SysDVR version 6.2.1: https://github.com/exelix11/SysDVR/releases/tag/v6.2.1
I will look into adding support for starting/stopping the sysdvr module at a later point.

1.0.14
This rebuilds the overlay with libnx 4.10.0 to make sure it fully supports firmware 21.0.0 and atmosphere 1.10.0.
Also prepares the support for the next sysDVR update.
The header now also shows the sysdvr ipc version, the overlay communicates with.

1.0.13
This update just adds compatibility with the newest SysDVR version 6.2.1
I will look into adding support for starting/stopping the sysdvr module at a later point.
